website_summaries.verdict: If you need a double rod model for dual curtain styles, this is a terrific choice.
pros: Dual set is versatile for numerous window treatment styles
cons: Color description may be a bit off
They are also a bit challenging to mount

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting more of these
customer_reviews.text: Great curtain rods. Heavy thick metal, doesn't bend in the middle like the set I replaced. The only thing I'd mention for installing is to install the bottom screw first, then spin the unit vertical and put in the upper screw. That's backwards to most curtainrods, but you need to do it here, because the designer never used a real screwdriver and didn't leave a LOT of room to get the screws in. Certainly not enough for a screwgun or electric screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Ellin Beltz

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I am giving 4 stars is because the end decorative hardware pieces (finials) are tiny. I thought they were going to be much larger than they are. I didn't read the reviews though. Had I done that I would have known! Still a great product for the price. This is the double rod, I just don't have the sheers I like yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Marie

customer_reviews.title: Its more like 3/4 inch
customer_reviews.text: This is not 1-inch. Its more like 3/4 inch. Very flimsy. False description.
customer_reviews.author: D. A.

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your time
customer_reviews.text: very unhappy with this item. it's extremely flimsy, even more so than I expected for the cheap price. when extended to maximum length, there is no stopper piece to keep with rods for bowing down in the middle, which makes it virtually impossible to open and close curtains as well as makes the entire thing look droopy at all times. the screws that came with it were trash and bent while trying to drill. my package did not even contain the decorative knobs for the ends of the poles, only cheap plastic caps. This purchase was a complete nightmare, do not waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor seller experience!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product three different times now, and I have always liked them. This time, the product was absolutely horrible. Instead of the usual, quality product I get, these were cheap looking and spray coated the silver color. My previous orders were high quality metal finish. On top of that, there was NO mounting hardware included in the box. Lastly, the rods were put into a cardboard box with no wrapping or protection and were loosely clanking about inside. So disappointed. They are definitely being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: The price was right.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good upgrade for us from the rod set that was on this one window for several years. The rods are a substantial weight, with attractive small/larger finials. However, I wish the wall mounts weren't plastic and that the hardware screws weren't a bare stainless steel silver color that I now have to paint ivory. That the rod set was off white ivory is the main reason we bought these, replacing a stark white older rod that never looked right against the white trim and white sheer.
customer_reviews.author: PenroseTribar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Junky, Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap junk. It claims it extends up to 144" however if you extend this that far, there is hardly any overlap between the bars. Causing it to be really flimsy, it looks really weird too. Anytime you move a curtain at this point the whole thing kind of rattles, because there isn't any support from brackets or overlapping bars. Additionally the paint flakes off the brackets really easy. I would recommend going to target they have similar curtain rods of higher quality for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: John Samwore

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, and looks ok.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straightforward to install. The brackets were difficult to get the screw tip into. If I wanted to do it by hand, I could've used a long narrow screw driver, but I was reaching above my head installing just below the ceiling. Some folks commented about the extension being visible in the middle. This is true but doesn't bother me. The finials are smaller than I expected, but that's ok. The rod is NOT 1-inch. It is 3/4 and the smaller one is like 9/16. It took me less than 30 minutes to hang, alone.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho IT Guy

customer_reviews.title: Rod works, but pulling to full advertised length leaves them a bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: These work well for what we wanted. But they are not inherently very sturdy at the full pull out length as they are advertised. If you do pull them out full advertised length, that only leaves a few inches of overlapping rod. At shorter lengths, the rod is sturdy enough. As we needed them to pull out to full length, I did have to have some internal supporting structure- a wooden dowel that I wrapped with a bit of Gorilla tape to make it snug. I do like the holders and the little set screws that tighten around the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Balinas

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Set sent
customer_reviews.text: The item has two rods (each with three components, that are supposed to reach up to 144 inches. I bought two sets, and one is complete, but the other has no third component for the bigger of the two rods. There is no way to contact the seller, so I am stuck. There is no Contact Seller button on the MY Orders page, and I do not care to return the deficient item, I just want the third (smaller) component sent to me. This was really disappointing. I had someone in to hang my new rods and he could only do half the job. Quality control and contact is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Coated Metal, Off-White, Three-Bracket, Holds Very Heavy Curtains
customer_reviews.text: These have been fantastic. They're sturdy, coated metal. I'm wondering if others saying they received plastic are referring to the coating on the outside? They were off-white, so they may have fixed the "green" problems others are reporting. Mine came with three brackets for support. They are holding four thick, heavy, heat-blocking curtains--two on each rod. (They're in my office upstairs and I wanted to be doubly sure that room stayed COOL in the summer.) We've had them up about a month now. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bad product in every way
customer_reviews.text: This is a product with very poor design. The metal curves are in the way of getting the screws in the wall. There's no place for the screw driver. Also feels thin and flimsy, not a good choice if you have heavy drapes. The worst part is, IT DOESN'T SLIDE! The only two advantages are the look and the price, but will not buy it again. Even thinking of taking it off and installing something else that actually works, but hesitant because it had taken such a pain and effort to install. The sunk cost is just too big.
customer_reviews.author: boardlover

customer_reviews.title: Decent, Could be Stronger
customer_reviews.text: Needed the curtain rod for our back patio sliders that extend 144”. These fit, but just barely. The rods feel cheap and I was afraid they would cave in under the weight of our curtains considering how heavy the curtains are. It’s been a month and the rod is still up. It does look a little bowed in certain places, but so far so good. I wouldn’t recommended this rod if your sliders are as wide as mine. For piece of mind, something longer would be better. At the time, this was all that was available for us.
customer_reviews.author: opSHANal

customer_reviews.title: Overall, nice product
customer_reviews.text: The rods and brackets are very nice however, the brackets are very difficult to screw into the wall. There needs to be a little more space to allow the screwdriver to reach comfortably into the screwhead. You end up screwing in the screws at an angle (especially the bottom one) and possibly stripping the screwhead. Overall, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: errivera

customer_reviews.title: Gave these a three star because of the difficulty hanging the brackets
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on these rods, bought them anyway, They ARE extremely difficult to hang the brackets, I thought an offset screwdriver would work, but that didn't work very well either, there is not enough clearance where the screws go in. Also one of the brackets had a "holiday" in the paint coverage. good thing I just bought some black spray paint. They look nice with the curtains I purchased from Wayfair as well.
customer_reviews.author: woodsywoman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed to find that brackets are not metal and are very tiny. I like the look of them, but decided to order different (METAL) brackets out of the fear that the ones that came with these curtain rods will not be able to withstand the weight of sheer and darkening curtains together on my 124" window. I wish I could return them as I ordered 3 of them for 3 windows. However, it took me a while to get around to install them that now it is too late.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent and totally unusable! Not the length advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, poorly made and arrived completely bent! I can't even use this if I tried. The mounts look like a step up from plastic and would break if I put any pressure on them. Contacting Amazon for a refund. What a joke. EDIT: Was sent a replacement from Amazon, but Jesus these are still awful! Thankfully they're bent. I'm half expecting them to fall off the wall at some point. They're insanely difficult to get in the wall (spiral placement) and not the length advertised and falls short of my window.
customer_reviews.author: Serena 🐌

customer_reviews.title: Gold paint on black isn't bronze!
customer_reviews.text: These are decent, easy to install and sturdy enough for my purpose (sheers/medium weight canvas curtains with grommets), but the "antique bronze"? Nope. Black with gold painted edges. I should have taken a closer look at the pictures, it's evident! However, if it's called "bronze" you kind of expect it to be the color bronze. Meh. Still looks fine and I'm happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on my wall
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely with all pieces intact. I needed the longer rod because my window is 76" wide plus I wanted my curtains to hang outside the window frame. Looks good on my wall, exactly as I hoped! It was a pain in the butt to get the screws into the brackets, but doable. Minus one star for installation difficulty. I ordered the matching curtain hold backs!
customer_reviews.author: Alec and Sheila LutaTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Not made for 2 Curtains.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of Money. They claim it 2 Curtain rod. It hardly holds 1 Ring Curtain. I bought it Thinking that I can hang 1 Sheer and one Black Out Curtains On it. But This Rod is not made for 2 Ring Curtains. Also the Quality is poor. I would not recommend this at all. I had to remove 1 Rod in order to us this Rod with my Ring Curtains which I specially ordered.
customer_reviews.author: User@123

customer_reviews.title: These are ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They look ok once installed but the screws are very awkward to screw into the wall due to the scroll pattern of the brackets. One if the ball ends that screw on to the rod was broken when we received parcel. I chose to glue it and put that side towards the wall. The ball end material is not chrome but molded plastic colored chrome. Overall they will do for now. Thank you, Mary Magnusen
customer_reviews.author: Mary Magnusen

customer_reviews.title: Good rods
customer_reviews.text: First, these were a pain to install. If you're looking to install a rod set without a drill this is not the set for you. I would not have been able to mount the bases if I hadn't been able to predrill the holes and use my screw gun to get the screws in. Beside that I love this set. The rods are secure and don't pull out from the piece that's attached to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Emmaly

customer_reviews.title: I love these curtain rods
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtain rods. I have ordered them to go on every window in my house. They are so easy to install. Extremely affordable compared to most double curtain rod prices. And they look beautiful. I even use them for single curtains just because they were cheaper than most single curtain rods as well. Then if I change my mind later and one double curtain means I have that option. I would highly recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Mounting was difficult but look great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a hard time securing the mounts to the wall, because of the angle wear the screw need to be put into the mount and wall. He was very insistent I mention that in the review. For the price I would encourage finding another rod set with better mounting pieces. They look great but we will be more careful in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a thinner, single rod that was bending even with center support. The single supports were also bending. I am not using the back rod, because I have blackout curtains already. But the design and material of the bracket, coupled with the thicker metal of the pole itself, make for a much, much stronger system that should last a very long time. I have two of these above twin sliders on a lakeside home that gets a ton of use, and they are very beautiful and impressive. Thankful to have switched to them!
customer_reviews.author: northwest coast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The curtain rod was packaged well to prevent any damage. Instructions were easy to follow, for I put the rod up myself without any help. It took me less than an hour to install, and I was very careful and measured and remeasured to get it perfectly straight. I was very pleased with the quality. The rod looks beautiful, and there are different colors to match the paint scheme of a room. I chose the gold color. I was pleased to find that the rod didn't protrude over 4-5" but hugs the wall. I'm so pleased I have ordered 2 smaller of the same type to use in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Nice decorative option!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Brown. It looks like the photos in the item description but darker than the photos in the photos section at the top of the page. Everything is as described. My husband had no trouble assembling. We didn’t end up needing the extension pieces. Love this item- it really added a nice touch to our home. I love the decorative style in these.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and understated
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, barely looked at the instructions. Pretty self explanatory, that’s coming from someone that regularly reads instructions. It is very sturdy feeling. I bought it based on the review that compared amazon basic rods to some other brands. I would note that the end pieces are relatively small and do not make a statement at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mkeshav

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely difficult to install, the curvature gets in the way of the screws and you must go in at an angle manually (no way to use a drill). The thickness can support my heavier curtains, however the material is not metal feeling, more of a cheap lightweight plastic. All in all it looks nice once I finally got it installed, but I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 1" double curtain rods.
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy well made curtain rods. The rods and brackets have a good paint coat on them and look fantastic. The mounting issue others have had was not an issue for me really. The one hole is slightly blocked by the shape of the bracket but it is perfectly functional by slightly angling the mounting screw being used. Great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood

customer_reviews.title: The rod hangers are a little plasticie and don't seem like the rod and hangers could support 144" black out ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on a 144 inch window and that may to too much of a length for these rods even though it says it can extend to 144".. The rod hangers are a little plasticie and don't seem like the rod and hangers could support 144" black out curtains. It only came with 3 rod hangers and the rod were shagging with nothing but a lace curtain on the inner rods. Ended up buying two heavier rod hangers so the rod wouldn't sag when I put up the black out curtains.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. Unfortunately not the best solution for all. I purchased the double rod. I have a sheer curtain with grommet top and a room darkening curtain also a grommet top. The distance between the two rods is not deep enough for the 2 to easily slide. It was time consuming and they are already up.so they are staying. Had I known before hand I could have purchased a rod pocket sheer or a different rod.
customer_reviews.author: Merijane1573

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my living room and bedroom because they were inexpensive. But that’s true that you get what you pay. The rods were thin and Looked cheaply made as well. For the price these were ok but I would rather prefer to spend few extra bucks and get more sturdy and better looking curtain rods.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic rod
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic rod, I just don't get the negative reviews! Well made, easy to install, and covered my double door perfectly with no sagging in the middle even though I chose to not use the middle support. Looks just like the picture. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good with my living room set
customer_reviews.text: This looks really great in my living room. I thought the ends would be bigger, but they're fine. The only negative is that the screw anchors are terrible, and flimsy, so I'd suggest buying a box of higher quality anchors for installation from home Depot, Lowe's, or your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. KING

customer_reviews.title: He/we loves the way it looks and how great the curtains slide and how it doesn't bow
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed these, and LOVES them. He/we loves the way it looks and how great the curtains slide and how it doesn't bow.. It's ALOT to say when he likes anything, because he's extremely picky. Super easy to install & we have really heavy curtains on them. The negative reviews that I've seen are based on people thinking they were heavy... These are light curtain rods, but work and look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap and flimsy product. Need it to span a wide window with a small Palladian at the top and the rod is so flimsy, it sags. The finials are crappy resin and one came broken. Unfortunately, I ordered two of these rods. I'll research returning both. VERY disappointed. $31? No way, more like a $10 product. That's the most I'd pay for this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great elegant rod
customer_reviews.text: Did purchase of several of those rods. Very happy for all of them. They looks great and add value to my rooms. The double has two different size of diameter, while the single has a large size of rod. Used with Achim Home Furnishings DRVL14GW12 Darcy Window Curtain Valance, 58" x 14", Grey/White, wonderful appeal. Elegant and unusual. So happy, thank you also for fast and no issue delivery.
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new they sent used
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this one star because I paid for new and I was sent used product. The package was completely taped up, every little package on the inside had rip holes and the item was scuffed up. I’m having a baby soon and I don’t have time to send this back and get a new one so I’m going to use it but I’m not a very happy new mom to be right now! If I pay for new I expect new product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynzie S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. They fixed the design issue other reviews complained about. (Although you could use an extra long screwdriver to fix that design flaw ...just sayin’) Looks great! Does the job. My only concern Was about the difference in diameter of the extension. I just got a pipe cutter and cut the extra pieces it came with. Now the rods look like a uniform size. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Heavy duty hardware!! Best curtain rods I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Costa

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Quality - Cheap Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the reviews. I'll admit, I read reviews but sometimes an individuals expectation does not reflect the actual product. The reviews that described the Double Rod set as "cheap" were absolutely correct. The hardware seems like a hard plastic. Not ideal for something that will have exposure to sunlight and over time break down, crack and/or crumble. Ideally window hardware should be metal so I'm very disappointed that someone would actually choose to design and sell such an inferior quality product. This item is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid I figured I would be getting something which wasn't so cheap. The castings were of very poor quality, paint was missing on arrival and one of the brackets was bent quite a bit, which I did not notice until after they were on the wall. The rods themselves seem like they are OK, but again for the price I've seen nicer at Lowes. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product. If you need to use the full length of the rods you will have problems. This rod does not come with the clear rod stoppers so that you can hold the rod is place. The rod slides freely without the required stoppers and therefore when using it in full length the rod falls apart. I'm so very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Tammy James

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These curtain rods were a lot better quality than I was expecting since I paid such a good price for them. They worked perfectly for our very large windows and the double rod makes the window dressings look straight out of a magazine. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SmithStine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. It’s thin, cheap, I regret putting it on the wall. Packaging sucks, came loose inside a box.
customer_reviews.author: Exotic Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far. I like the mounts, they are nice and sturdy. This set comes with three pieces to expand enough to cover 144". The window I am treating with this rod set is 87" and per product guidelines, I was able to only use 2 pieces for each rod. This leaves a large and small diameter rod left over that I can likely use on another window. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to install
customer_reviews.text: Well made, matched my oil-rubbed bronze fixtures well enough. The end piece of one rod was broken upon arrival. Easy enough to install, if you have a partner and the patience required with any curtain adventure.
customer_reviews.author: medwards1

customer_reviews.title: Good curtain rod/broken
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good curtain rod but I gave it three stars because it arrived to me Broken. The box was not damaged so I'm pretty sure the item was damaged before it was packed. Two of the bars were bent luckily they were the extender bars which I didn't need and one of the little end pieces that you screw on was cracked. Other than that good purchase just wish I would have got one in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because they are not very strong. The curtains are super light and it still made them slightly “dip”. I am still pleased with the look but I’m wondering if I were wanting to use black out curtains if they would be supported.
customer_reviews.author: Wittney Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great product - and manufacturer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this double curtain rod to keep out the light from our bedroom's massive windows. It was easy to install and looks beautiful! When it arrived it was actually missing one of the knob end-pieces, so I contacted the manufacturer, Beme. They sent out a replacement part SUPER fast, no questions asked, and the person who wrote back via email was very kind. I am very impressed with both the product and its manufacturer! Whenever I need curtain rods, I'll buy more of these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sleek look!
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks really cute but I'm a 5'2 gal and setting it up by myself was very difficult since my window is over 120 in long and 100 in tall. The rods are a lot lighter than expected and don't feel very durable, however, it's not like my curtain are really heavy to break them. I did have to use the extender and the middle hook which was very necessary. The rods are not sturdy so they immediately slumped down in the middle and I could see it would've snapped the rods and fallen. Otherwise I think this was pretty good price.
customer_reviews.author: f_nema

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drapery rod to use in my living room. Product is very light and I thought that this would be a problem as far as durability goes however, it made it much easier to hang. Very nice, soft satin like finish to the product and looks great once installed. The curtains I purchased to use with this curtain rod were of a moderate weight and hang very nicely (6 panels total). I was worried the weight would cause the rod to bend but this has not been a problem. Great product and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: L MC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap quality. They do NOT hold up when expanded. The ones I have set up on the smaller windows were ok but when installing the end pieces fell and broke right away. They are not metal, like they look. I would definitely recommend to look at another rod if you have a large window.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Agoris

customer_reviews.title: Curtain rods look great!
customer_reviews.text: I work Night shift, often 12 hours at a time. These rods were imperative in holding up some black out curtains I purchased to go on them. They look great and were easy to install. The packaging was as if someone actually cared and wanted their product to arrive undamaged, and that is exactly what happened. The installation was pretty smooth, aside from the Missus telling me how to do everything and me running out of beer. But thats my problem. They look great and were perfect for my use
customer_reviews.author: brother moe

customer_reviews.title: What kind of intelligent person designed this mount were you cannot screw the ...
customer_reviews.text: What kind of intelligent person designed this mount were you cannot screw the screws in without angling in. Good luck if you are mounting close to the ceiling. How hard would it have been to stretch the holes for screws a little wider outside of the curves. I was able to mount it but I’m just tired of idiocy for such simple things. Absolutely no reason one should need to angle a screw just to drive it in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: For the price...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it isn't bad. It has three brackets! The brackets are awkward and you must use your screwdriver at an angle - best to start with the bottom screw and flip over to get the top screw in and go from there. The curtain rod does not meet in the middle (Big rod and little rod), but I don't really care it is still aesthetically pleasing enough to me. Overall it was a very easy install and it looks pretty. Just have a little patience with the design. It does what it is supposed to do and don't expect perfect design for the price.
customer_reviews.author: madxjor

customer_reviews.title: Bad design for me to use
customer_reviews.text: The rods are not adjustable so rare too close to window frame to hang curtains without them catching. Would have to mount on window frame. Also second rod too close to top rod to allow you to open and close under panels. Bad design for me to use. Purchased to go with curtains we were waiting on and now Amazon will not let us return. Be sure to open ASAP or your stuck with something you can't use! First time I'm very disappointed with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Rods - Not for Large Grommets
customer_reviews.text: The double rod set looks very nice and is easy to hang. I was hanging curtain panels that have larger metal grommets and the two rods were spaced a little too closely for that kind of curtain. The valance had to squash the curtains a little to hang properly. For loop top curtains/valances or traditional curtains, the rod set would be perfectly fine. Just bear that in mind if getting grommet-topped curtain panels. Very sturdy and look way more expensive than they are. I got the tiebacks also and they were perfect with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Cute, & decent quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Quality is pretty good especially considering the price. One of my end caps did arrive damaged. But I had one window that was so close to the wall that I couldn’t cap it anyway 🤷🏻‍♀️ I did need to put a swoop valance on the rod, because the extra long rod is three pieces and the joints were ugly and visible with out the valance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for light weight material curtains
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is good. You wouldn't want to hang heavy curtains. But for light weight it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More value than the price.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the rods installed yesterday and they are absolutely perfect? Gorgeous set. It will make your room look beautiful. Not one single problem or issues while installing. Took less than 30 minutes, and my shear and curtains were hanging proudly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and customer service was the best Ive ever delt with
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Was exactly the look we were going for, a piece even arrived broken, we called the company and within 3 days had the replacement part on our doorstep. When we redo the other rooms will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad02917

customer_reviews.title: Great color, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: One of the finials arrived broken. I was able to glue it easily, and it didn’t affect the usability of the rod. Aside from that, it’s just what I wanted, good price, and easy to install. My curtains arrived today, and my sheets will arrive tomorrow. Looking forward to completing the look.
customer_reviews.author: Pearce Family

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice and as described
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to install. They are very nice looking and priced extremely reasonable. I bought for 2 windows and plan to buy for 3 more window treatments.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The brackets that screw into the wall are my only complaint, if you can call it that. Trying to fanagle the drill to a proper angle caused a chip to the paint, but no big deal, really. Overall it seems sturdy with a sheer layer and darkening curtains. Came with a third bracket that i didnt need to use. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: rachel schuler

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod.
customer_reviews.text: These look nice, and function well enough. Like many rods, they're design is annoying for install, making it difficult to access the screws. Not as bad as some brands, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: KungFuJosh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and not big ends on the rod! Worked great for us!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product if: you are looking for double curtain rod, not for a big window, balls on the ends are not big, - it worked out for us because our window is right next to the wall (so no space for a big end ball)
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: They look nice and are of decent quality
customer_reviews.text: These rods worked well for a large blackout curtain and white sheer to cover a wide sliding door. They look nice and are of decent quality. Not a huge deal, but the smaller sheer rod could be a bit sturdier when extending. Even after tightening the rod on the bracket with all the screws, it seems to move around and bend a bit. Keep in mind, this is with needing to extend and use the 3rd bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice in our living room
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice in our living room. Was super easy to install, but at the time of ordering two at once Amazon sent from two separate warehouses and one of them wasn't even the correct color. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised, but just a bit light-weight.
customer_reviews.text: As with the curtain holdbacks, these absolutely function 100% as advertised. They are just a bit tacky and light-weight. Were I to "James Bond" myself out of my bedroom window, these would definitely NOT hold my weight. But - for all intents and purposes - these fit the bill and the budget perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: This works for what I wanted. I struggled slightly putting the brackets in the wall, but to be fair I was using a step stool and was a little too low, so I think it was more me than the actual hardware. Once the brackets were up the poles were really easy to put up. Like the look this created over my window.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: The knob at the end of the rod was broken. I was still able to use it, nonetheless I was a little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Two

customer_reviews.title: Nice double rod
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and the price was much better than I found locally. I had trouble with two of the ends. The plastic piece that the end screws into was either stripped or placed in a bit off center. The result is that I can't get the end to fit as perfectly as it should. I didn't notice this until they were both installed or else I would have return them for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Induetime

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These are really bad quality. The rods feel cheap and thin, like $5 curtain rods you get at the hardware store. The finials are plastic resin, and one of each size was broken or chipped. The brackets are some kind of lightweight and cheap metal that almost feels like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: DracheMitch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for the price. Do they look like incredibly high end rods? Of course not. Are they more than adequate to do the job of holding curtains over my very wide picture window, which would ordinarily cost me my first born child? Indubitably. They look nice, are long enough, and hold my insulated curtains, with the shears underneath. That's exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - ruined Christmas surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was shipped the wrong item, it was a single rod instead of a double. I needed it to complete a room remodel for me daughters Christmas present....here I am the day before Christmas Eve trying to Install it and realizing it’s not even the right one. Bottom line, the brand is cheap, poor quality and I won’t try to order the correct rod.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Cheapish and Miniscule for a Large Room
customer_reviews.text: This double rod is only fit for small rooms. A 1" rod is not substantial enough for large windows. Also, I ordered four sets of these and the finials were all scratched or had pieces chip off. The finials are also pretty small, though I guess it matches the 1" rod. Could have been bigger. Super glue and being high up helps to hide defects on the finials. If you're just looking for the cheapest double rod that's fairly decent looking, then this is the best price I've seen on the net. If you want something nice, I would suggest spending the money to buy a better rod set.
customer_reviews.author: Celestine

customer_reviews.title: Pairs beautifully w/all the hardware of our master bath - only ...
customer_reviews.text: Pairs beautifully w/all the hardware of our master bath - only "issue" if there is one, as others have mentioned, is that the more forward bar sticks out such that light comes in behind it on the sides of your curtains - but for us, it only affects one window so it's not a huge deal for us - we have found the material to be sturdy
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: It's fine if you don't have energetic pets
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight. Light curtains only. It's fine if you don't have energetic pets, children, or other uncoordinated family members that are going to pull on them.
customer_reviews.author: Analein

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These rods are quite attractive and sturdy. The reason for 4 stars is that if you intend to open and close your curtains regularly the grommets or hooks on the curtains will leave marks on the rod damaging the finish. The rod does not have a protective coating.
customer_reviews.author: twilite2000Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rods.
customer_reviews.text: We love them. fairly easy to install. not as big as the product pic is a closeup. have to use manual screw driver as the screws are hard to reach.
customer_reviews.author: VijayV

customer_reviews.title: Great product and elegant quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good one...Bought quite a number of them (maybe 10 or so) for my new home.....Installed a month or so after I purchased it. The round cap in the end was broken for couple of them....Not sure whether it was broke during shipping or when I moved the package to my new home using the movers...Hence, didn't contact the seller....I like the product overall Edit Changing it to five stars as the package issue was probably caused by the movers who moved it to my new home
customer_reviews.author: Anand Narasimhan

customer_reviews.title: Curtain rod
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for our guest bedroom. Absolutely love it. I am disappointed thought I wanted to order another one for my other bedroom and the price is now double. So I won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: cokebear11

customer_reviews.title: Great curtain rods
customer_reviews.text: These curtain rods are exactly what I was looking for. My lovely dog was ruining my blinds I had professionally installed (not happy), so I removed them and installed curtains. They were easy to install, well...my friend installed them I helped (a little). They looked easy to install. My window is 95 inches wide, these rods fit perfectly, with out using the extra extension. They box came with the materials needed (screws and mollies) to install the rods, plus instructions. I'm very pleased with my purchase. I wish had done it years ago, instead of wasting so much on blinds. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but they're not white
customer_reviews.text: These, like their matching drape holdbacks, have a hint of green undertone to them and are not a bright white. It personally doesn't bother me, but if you're looking for the perfect white these aren't it. For the price it would be worth ordering them and spray painting.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good for medium weight curtains..
customer_reviews.text: For the price and ease of installation I give 4 stars.. The inner rod holds lightweight sheers & on the outer rod I have 4medium weight curtains with grommets..I only needed to extend the center of the outer rod 1' so this worked out perfect for my use..would probably not be the best for heavy draperies tho and the finials were smaller than expected..
customer_reviews.author: Fmk

customer_reviews.title: It is good work on my window
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 Decopolitan Beme International Urn Telescoping Double Drapery Rod Set for my windows ,it is easy to use ,I put my ccurtains on it ,looks my windows are pretty .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The curtain rods are described correctly, however; the end caps that give the decorative accent were badly scratched on 3 of the 4 decorative urn caps upon delivery. Because of this, I am rating the product/seller 2 stars. I have purchased 7 others of these from the same seller and they were all packaged well with no defects and all look amazing and incredibly easy to install. If the seller wishes to replace the Urn caps of these "defected" or damaged rods from my last order, I would change and review this product to five stars, as the product and seller met the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These were pretty inexpensive and I like them. They were exactly what I thought they'd be! They have a vintage feel but didn't break the bank. Sure, there are nicer, more expensive rods I could have bought but these work great. Also, saw complaints that they aren't white. I never thought they were white, these are more of an off white/white/cream mix...but they look exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up. I searched everywhere for a double rod that wasn’t plain, but wasn’t too much. This one was just right and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: What i wanted, but came with a scratch
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, I do recommend it, it came a bit scratched but no one will ever notice.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod. Skull friendly.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice rods. I have a 120" triple window that I wanted to hang thermal curtains over. You can't crack any skulls with these (as I learned when it slipped while I was installing), but you can keep the sun at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Mahn

customer_reviews.title: Sent this one back
customer_reviews.text: Really wasn't happy with this. It isn't a 1" rod, its more around 3/4". The color seemed ok it was rather flimsy construction. I went to the local bed store and bought a 1.5" set for roughly the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Honez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it since couple weeks and it looks great and still sturdy. Would recommend it. Only 4 stars cause of the price and installation is always a little pain in the a... With everything that haves to do with curtains and a short person like me lol.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets and they came in the same undamaged box. One of them was complete and not damaged. Both poles were damaged on the other. The large pole was bent and the small one was missing one half of the adjustable pole. The brackets and nobbs are sturdy but the adjustable pole is flimsy and doesn't have a locking position. The brackets have screws to hold the pole but they scratch the paint on the pole if they slide.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOUBLE ROD SET
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this set. I pretty much maxed them out at 144" and they are sturdy and looks great over my bay window. My only gripe, they didn't come with the little plastic inserts where the rods meet up, so my drapes hang up just a little bit in that spot.
customer_reviews.author: Kai808

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, pretty off white color with nice finials. Rods are sturdy and brackets are metal. Screws are not a finished color, so they may need to be painted if you want them less obvious. Comes with 3 brackets for wider windows to be used as needed. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: charis29

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice after installation
customer_reviews.text: It's very light. Easy to install. Seems to be made of plastic. But it looks very nice when installed. Also easy to add additional curtains panels w/o removing rod.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Larger in photo
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put up. The finials are larger in picture
customer_reviews.author: Catherine osborn

product_meta.title: Decopolitan Beme International Urn Telescoping Double Drapery Rod Set, 36-72-Inch, Brown
product_meta.description: Size:36-72-Inch| Color:BrownEmbellish your windows and give them that special look with this stylish Decopolitan Telescoping Double Drapery Rod Set. Authentic materials and durable construction ensure long-lasting use. The rich finish compliments any room design. Perfect for any bedroom, living room, kitchen or bathroom. Matching Clip Rings and Holdbacks available to complete your look.
feature_bullets: Available in two adjustable sizes: 36-72" and 72-144"
Front drapery rod has 7/8" diameter and back sheer drapery rod has 5/8" diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,972 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
